description: This file defines a RecyclerView Adapter (MenuItemAdapter) for displaying menu items in a food delivery app. The adapter manages item presentation, including favorite toggles, quantity controls, and customization hints, integrating with UI components and external data models.

classes.name: MenuItemAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView Adapter for displaying menu items, supporting favorite toggling, quantity adjustments, and customization options.

classes.name: VH
classes.description: ViewHolder class managing individual menu item views in the RecyclerView.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for efficient list updates based on MenuItem differences.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and inflates the ViewHolder for a menu item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds data from a MenuItem to the ViewHolder's views, setting up UI elements and interactions.
